thread.title: BRIEF-Premium Brands Reports Q1 Adj. Earnings Per Share Of C$0.50

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Premium Brands Reports Q1 Adj. Earnings Per Share Of C$0.50
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - Premium Brands Holdings Corp:
* ANNOUNCES RECORD FIRST QUARTER SALES AND ADJUSTED EBITDA AND INCREASES ITS GUIDANCE FOR 2018
* Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE C$0.50 * Q1 REVENUE C$584.9 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW C$582.7 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$0.68 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* REAFFIRMED ITS 2018 OUTLOOK FOR ITS LEGACY BUSINESSES * INCREASED ITS OVERALL 2018 SALES AND ADJUSTED EBITDA GUIDANCE BY $330.0 MILLION AND $30.0 MILLION, RESPECTIVELY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
